title: What I saw in the war
description: Reporter Janine di Giovanni has been to the worst places on Earth to bring back stories from Bosnia, Sierra Leone and most recently Syria. She tells stories of human moments within large conflicts -- and explores that shocking transition when a familiar city street becomes a bombed-out battleground.
author: Janine di Giovanni
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, global issues, journalism, war, PTSD, Syria
